verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi came בִשְׁמוֹנִ֣ים <WH8084> vish-mo-Nim and eightieth שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba' And it came to pass in the four מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֡ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year לְצֵ֣את <WH3318> le-Tzet were come out בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- after the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> me-'e-retz- of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <WH4714> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt בַּשָּׁנָ֨ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah year הָרְבִיעִ֜ית <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'It in the fourth בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> be-Cho-desh in the month זִ֗ו <WH2099> Ziv, Zif ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu which הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, which [is] the second לִמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> lim-Loch reign שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh of Solomon's עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; over Israel וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven that he began to build הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit the house לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> ve-hab-Ba-yit, And the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּנָ֜ה <WH1129> ba-Nah built הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech which king שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> she-lo-Moh Solomon לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, for the LORD שִׁשִּֽׁים־ <WH8346> shish-shim- thereof [was] threescore אַמָּ֥ה <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits אָרְכּ֖וֹ <WH753> a-re-Ko the length וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim thereof twenty רָחְבּ֑וֹ <WH7341> ra-che-Bo; and the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> ko-ma-To. [cubits] and the height

וְהָאוּלָ֗ם <WH197> ve-ha-'u-Lam, And the porch עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> pe-Nei before הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> hei-Chal the temple הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit, of the house עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <WH753> a-re-Ko, [was] the length עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> pe-Nei the front רֹ֣חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav thereof according to the breadth הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; of the house עֶ֧שֶׂר <WH6235> 'E-ser [and] ten בָּאַמָּ֛ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבּ֖וֹ <WH7341> ra-che-Bo [was] the breadth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei the front הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit. thereof before the house

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as he made לַבָּ֔יִת <WH1004> lab-Ba-yit, And for the house חַלּוֹנֵ֖י <WH2474> chal-lo-Nei windows שְׁקֻפִ֥ים <WH8261> she-ku-Fim lights אֲטֻמִֽים׃ <WH331> 'a-tu-Mim. of narrow

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> vai-yi-Ven he built עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Against קִ֨יר <WH7023> kir And against the wall הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house; יָצֹועַ ya-tzo-a' כיָצִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3326> ya-Tzi-a' bed קסָבִ֔יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, round about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִיר֤וֹת <WH7023> ki-Rot [against] the walls הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, round about לַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> la-hei-Chal [both] of the temple וְלַדְּבִ֑יר <WH1687> ve-lad-de-Vir; and of the oracle וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as and he made צְלָע֖וֹת <WH6763> tze-la-'ot chambers סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

הַיָּצֹועַ hai-ya-tzo-a' כהַיָּצִ֨יעַ <WH3326> hai-ya-Tzi-a' bed קהַתַּחְתֹּנָ֜ה <WH8481> hat-tach-to-Nah The nethermost חָמֵ֧שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh [was] five בָּאַמָּ֣ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבָּ֗הּ <WH7341> ra-che-Bah, broad וְהַתִּֽיכֹנָה֙ <WH8484> ve-hat-ti-cho-Nah and the middle שֵׁ֤שׁ <WH8337> shesh [was] six בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבָּ֔הּ <WH7341> ra-che-Bah, broad וְהַ֨שְּׁלִישִׁ֔ית <WH7992> ve-Hash-she-li-Shit, and the third שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> She-va' [was] seven בָּאַמָּ֖ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits רָחְבָּ֑הּ <WH7341> ra-che-Bah; broad כִּ֡י <WH3588> ki for מִגְרָעוֹת֩ <WH4052> mig-ra-'Ot narrowed rests נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan he made לַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> lab-Ba-yit the house סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> sa-Viv round about ח֔וּצָה <WH2351> Chu-tzah, for without [in the wall] of לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti because אֲחֹ֥ז <WH270> 'a-Choz that [the beams] should not be fastened בְּקִֽירוֹת־ <WH7023> be-ki-rot- in the walls הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit. of the house

וְהַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> ve-hab-Ba-yit And the house בְּהִבָּ֣נֹת֔וֹ <WH1129> be-hib-Ba-no-To, when it was in building אֶֽבֶן־ <WH68> 'e-ven- of stone שְׁלֵמָ֥ה <WH8003> she-le-Mah made ready מַסָּ֖ע <WH4551> mas-Sa' before it was brought נִבְנָ֑ה <WH1129> niv-Nah; was built וּמַקָּב֤וֹת <WH4717> u-mak-ka-Vot thither so that there was neither hammer וְהַגַּרְזֶן֙ <WH1631> ve-hag-gar-Zen nor axe כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any כְּלִ֣י <WH3627> ke-Li [nor] any tool בַרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> var-Zel, of iron לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- neither נִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> nish-Ma' heard בַּבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> bab-Ba-yit in the house בְּהִבָּנֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH1129> be-hib-ba-no-To. while it was in building

פֶּ֗תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach, The door הַצֵּלָע֙ <WH6763> hatz-tze-La' chamber הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <WH8484> hat-Ti-cho-Nah, for the middle אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about כֶּ֥תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef side הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house הַיְמָנִ֑ית <WH3233> hay-ma-Nit; [was] in the right וּבְלוּלִּ֗ים <WH3883> u-ve-lul-Lim, with winding stairs יַֽעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> ya-'a-Lu and they went up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <WH8484> hat-Ti-cho-Nah, into the middle וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- at הַתִּֽיכֹנָ֖ה <WH8484> hat-ti-cho-Nah [chamber] and out of the middle אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shim. into the third

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven So he built אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit the house וַיְכַלֵּ֑הוּ <WH3615> vay-chal-Le-hu; and finished וַיִּסְפֹּ֤ן <WH5603> vai-yis-Pon it and covered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit the house גֵּבִ֔ים <WH1356> ge-Vim, with beams וּשְׂדֵרֹ֖ת <WH7713> u-se-de-Rot and boards בָּאֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH729> ba-'a-ra-Zim. made of cedar

וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven And [then] he built אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ; הַיָּצֹועַ hai-ya-tzo-a' כהַיָּצִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3326> hai-ya-Tzi-a' bed קעַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit, against all the house חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh five אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits קֽוֹמָת֑וֹ <WH6967> ko-ma-To; high וַיֶּאֱחֹ֥ז <WH270> vai-ye-'e-Choz and they rested אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit on the house בַּעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> ba-'a-Tzei [with] timber אֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim. of cedar פ Peh
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh came to Solomon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

הַבַּ֨יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit [Concerning] this house הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you בֹנֶ֗ה <WH1129> vo-Neh, which thou art in building אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if תֵּלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> te-Lech will walk בְּחֻקֹּתַי֙ <WH2708> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai my judgments תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh, and execute וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֥ <WH8104> ve-sha-mar-Ta and keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מִצְוֹתַ֖י <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tai all my commandments לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> la-Le-chet walking בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <WH6965> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti in them then will I perform אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבָרִי֙ <WH1697> de-va-Ri my word אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach, for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti with thee which I spake אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> da-Vid unto David אָבִֽיךָ׃ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha. thy father

וְשָׁ֣כַנְתִּ֔י <WH7931> ve-Sha-chan-Ti, And I will dwell בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and will not אֶעֱזֹ֖ב <WH5800> e-'e-Zo and will not forsake אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> 'am-Mi my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. Israel ס sa-Mek
וַיִּ֧בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh So Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit the house וַיְכַלֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH3615> vay-chal-Le-hu. and finished

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> vai-yi-Ven And he built אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִיר֨וֹת <WH7023> ki-Rot the walls הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house מִבַּ֙יְתָה֙ <WH1004> mib-Bay-tah within בְּצַלְע֣וֹת <WH6763> be-tzal-'ot with boards אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim, of cedar מִקַּרְקַ֤ע <WH7172> mik-kar-Ka' both the floor הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against קִיר֣וֹת <WH7023> ki-Rot and the walls הַסִּפֻּ֔ן <WH5604> has-sip-Pun, of the cieling צִפָּ֥ה <WH6823> tzip-Pah [and] he covered עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> 'etz with wood מִבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> mib-Ba-yit; [them] on the inside וַיְצַ֛ף <WH6823> vay-Tzaf and covered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קַרְקַ֥ע <WH7172> kar-Ka' the floor הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house בְּצַלְע֥וֹת <WH6763> be-tzal-'ot with planks בְּרוֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH1265> be-ro-Shim. of fir

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> vai-yi-Ven And he built אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty אַמָּ֜ה <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits; מִיַּרְכֹּותֵי mi-yar-ko-tei כמִֽיַּרְכְּתֵ֤י <WH3411> mi-yar-ke-Tei border קהַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house בְּצַלְע֣וֹת <WH6763> be-tzal-'ot with boards אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim, of cedar מִן־ <WH4480> min- both הַקַּרְקַ֖ע <WH7172> hak-kar-Ka' the floor עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against הַקִּיר֑וֹת <WH7023> hak-ki-Rot; and the walls וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven he even built לוֹ֙ lo מִבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> mib-Ba-yit [them] for it within לִדְבִ֔יר <WH1687> lid-Vir, [even] for the oracle לְקֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> le-Ko-desh [even] for the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> hak-ko-da-Shim. holy

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im it was forty בָּאַמָּ֖ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; And the house ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu that הַהֵיכָ֥ל <WH1964> ha-hei-Chal that [is] the temple לִפְנָֽי׃ <WH6440> lif-Nai. front

וְאֶ֤רֶז <WH730> ve-'E-rez And the cedar אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the house פְּנִ֔ימָה <WH6441> pe-Ni-mah, within מִקְלַ֣עַת <WH4734> mik-La-'at [was] carved פְּקָעִ֔ים <WH6497> pe-ka-'Im, with knops וּפְטוּרֵ֖י <WH6358> u-fe-tu-Rei open צִצִּ֑ים <WH6731> tzitz-Tzim; flowers הַכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> hak-Kol all אֶ֔רֶז <WH730> 'E-rez, all [was] cedar אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein there אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven there was no stone נִרְאָֽה׃ <WH7200> nir-'Ah. seen

וּדְבִ֧יר <WH1687> u-de-Vir And the oracle בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> be-toch- in הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit the house מִפְּנִ֖ימָה <WH6441> mip-pe-Ni-mah within הֵכִ֑ין <WH3559> he-Chin; he prepared לְתִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> le-tit-Ten to set שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> a-Ron there the ark בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> be-Rit of the covenant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> ve-lif-Nei in the forepart הַדְּבִ֡יר <WH1687> had-de-Vir And the oracle עֶשְׂרִים֩ <WH6242> 'es-Rim [was] twenty אַמָּ֨ה <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits אֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech in length וְעֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אַמָּ֣ה <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits רֹ֗חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav, in breadth וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits קֽוֹמָת֔וֹ <WH6967> ko-ma-To, in the height וַיְצַפֵּ֖הוּ <WH6823> vay-tzap-Pe-hu thereof and he overlaid זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold סָג֑וּר <WH5462> sa-Gur; it with pure וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> vay-Tzaf and [so] covered מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> miz-Be-ach the altar אָֽרֶז׃ <WH730> 'A-rez.
